high_descs: Turn around and go to the bed.
Take the apple from the bed.
Turn right and go near the desklamp.
Put the apple near the desklamp and it will glow.
anns.task_desc: To glow the DeskLamp using the apple.

high_descs: There is an apple on the bed.
desklamp is carried nearby in apple
The desklamp light came on as soon as the apple went to the table.
anns.task_desc: The bed  the DeskLamp light came on as soon as the apple went to the table.

high_descs: Exit from the room, turn right, go straight, turn left again, turn right to the bed.
Pick the apple and move towards the right.
Turn on the desklamp to move the apple.
anns.task_desc: Collect the night lamp from the desk and place it on the table.
